itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest 2 Time World Series Champion Aubrey Huff to discuss his career with teams such as the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, Houston Astros, Baltimore Orioles, Detroit Tigers, and San Francisco Giants, talk about how America’s youth are being destroyed by incarceration, tells some crazy drunken Vegas stories, Aubrey gives some marriage and dating advice, and he ends the show with explaining how fame is a lie.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest 2 Time World Series Champion Aubrey Huff to discuss his career with teams such as the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, Houston Astros, Baltimore Orioles, Detroit Tigers, and San Francisco Giants, talk about how America’s youth are being destroyed by incarceration, tells some crazy drunken Vegas stories, Aubrey gives some marriage and dating advice, and he ends the show with explaining how fame is a lie.
